ing: 1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard (such as French'sÂ®)
des: "This is a yummy, flavorful marinade that livens up bland chicken dinners. However, this could also be used on pork chops, fish and turkey! I made this with brown rice and used some of the unused marinade as a sauce to pour over the rice. DELICIOUS!!!"
ins: Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, mustard, and oregano in a bowl.
